类 App

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.newdawn.slick.BasicGame
      • App
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    org.newdawn.slick.ControlledInputReciever, org.newdawn.slick.ControllerListener, org.newdawn.slick.Game, org.newdawn.slick.InputListener, org.newdawn.slick.KeyListener, org.newdawn.slick.MouseListener

    public class App
extends org.newdawn.slick.BasicGame
    Main class for the game. Handles initialisation, input and rendering.

      • update

        public void update(org.newdawn.slick.GameContainer gc,
                   int delta)
            throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
        Update the game state for a frame.
        指定者:
        update 在接口中 org.newdawn.slick.Game
        指定者:
        update 在类中 org.newdawn.slick.BasicGame
        参数:
        gc - The Slick game container object.
        delta - Time passed since last frame (milliseconds).
        抛出:
        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException

      • render

        public void render(org.newdawn.slick.GameContainer gc,
                   org.newdawn.slick.Graphics g)
            throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
        Render the entire screen, so it reflects the current game state.
        参数:
        gc - The Slick game container object.
        g - The Slick graphics object, used for drawing.
        抛出:
        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
        Start-up method. Creates the game and runs it.
        参数:
        args - Command-line arguments (ignored).
        抛出:
        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
